remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是基元类型，例如`String`， `Decimal`，`Binary`或`DateTime`，则此方法调用中声明的相应方法之一类。If the is a primitive type, such as `String`, `Decimal`, `Binary` or `DateTime`, this method invokes one of the corresponding methods declared in the class. 否则，它将直接创建一个具有指定 的 对象。Otherwise, it creates a object with the specified directly.
